name: Keep the Heart Alive
description:
Keep the Heart alive is a game created in 48h for the Ludum Dare 46.

Gameplay wise, I wasn't really inspired by the theme so I went for a 90s weird "3D textures on 2D" feeling.

You play as a small blue character whose task is to protect the heart of the body he lives in from all the evil viruses.

Code: Game Maker : Studio

Art: Photoshop

SFX: Bfxr

Music: FL Studio

Have fun!
